titleStmt.title: The lawyer outlaw'd, or, A brief answer to Mr. Hunts defence of the charter with some useful remarks on the Commons proceedings in the last Parliament at Westminster, in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N.T. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
